text: Adobe appears to be getting ready for launch on a new stylus and smart ruler. Artists on twitter are talking about it working out pretty nicely. <http://www.engadget.com/2013/09/17/adobe-xd-mighty-napoleon-contour-parallel-hands-on/>

attachments.title: Adobe XD's Mighty and Napoleon prepare for retail, Contour and Parallel apps introduced (eyes-on)
attachments.text: As you've likely read today, Adobe XD has announced its plans to officially bring Projects Napoleon and Mighty -- a drafting ruler and cloud-connected
attachments.fallback: Engadget: Adobe XD's Mighty and Napoleon prepare for retail, Contour and Parallel apps introduced (eyes-on)

text: I'm really interested in that drafting ruler, Napoleon.
